Name: Castle Raven all random
Description: Save the princess from the Raven Castle
SuccessText: You clear the castle and save the princess!
FailText: The party is defeated and must regroup

Events.FailText: The party escapes the guards but takes a beating
The party gets cought in the trap and suffers some damage

Events.SuccessText: The party solves the puzzle and can move forward
Events.FailText: The party couldn't solve the puzzle and will have to find another way forward

Events.SuccessText: The party survied the trick food
Events.FailText: The party ate poisend food. Who could have forseen that!
The party got so lost and ended up at the beggining. Time to find a new way.

Events.SuccessText: The party was able to coninvce the guards that they are contracters and should be let by
Events.FailText: The party was unable to convince the guards and are now being chased by them!

Events.SuccessText: The party defeated the boss the rest of this should be easy!
Events.FailText: The party was defeated by the boss. He is the boss you know.
